com.adp.marketplace.connection.configuration

Class AuthorizationCodeConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adp.marketplace.connection.configuration.ConnectionConfiguration
      • com.adp.marketplace.connection.configuration.AuthorizationCodeConfiguration

  • public final class AuthorizationCodeConfiguration
extends ConnectionConfiguration

    AuthorizationCodeConfiguration is an implementation class of base abstract class ConnectionConfiguration which allows an application to configure connection with GrantType authorization_code based on OAuth 2.0 Specification.

    Author:
    tallaprs
